column2: "Ah, <%me>. Did you come to visit me? Heheheh, thank you."

"You don't have to worry, though.
I've made lots of friends as well."
"Oh, rumor has it... Hey, Afin! Over here!"
"Quna and... partner? You know each other?"
"You mentioned it before, didn't you? You're both working together in the new ARKS project."
"Well, Afin, how are you getting along with Io?"
"Sometimes, she just wants to be alone, so here I am."
"I understand, though. My sister, she was nothing like her."
"...H-huh? Did I cross a line? Is that something you're sensitive about?"
"No, that's not it. My sister is alive. If we get the chance, you might meet her."
"Well then, I have to go now. See you both later."
"...Phew, that was close. I thought I'd stepped on a landmine."
"It sounds complicated... but the look in his eyes lets me believe it'll be alright."
